Alexis Malagnino Doctor of Biology

My Expertise

I'm a Doctor of Biology from France, constantly seeking new challenges; no endeavor is too daunting or complex for me. Recently, I have been delving into the realm of Wildlife Ecology, conducting research on mountain goats. I have been working with a California-based startup called Alpine Insights, dedicated to enhancing our understanding of wildlife populations and ecosystems through innovative research initiatives. I am the inaugural biologist they recruited to contribute to their groundbreaking projects.

Prog. 1

I feel comfortable working on the front-end, going from pure CSS & HTML5 to Sass, Bootstrap or AngularJS/2+, VueJS and whatever!

Prog. 2

Most of my work has been in JavaScript/TypeScript, but I am quite familiar with Python and Java as well.

Prog. 3

Git, Gulp, Grunt, NPM, Linux, Docker, you name it, I have used a bajillion tools!
